Description: Gold ear-ring; flat crescent hammered from metal sheet narrowing to a wire terminals with circular section (ring and hook); bordered with a line of granules along the bottom rim on one side.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Amathus
Bibliographic references: Jewellery / Catalogue of the Jewellery, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum. (2460)
Laffineur et al. 1986 / Amathonte III. Testimonia 3. L'Orfèvrerie. Scarabées, scaraboïdes et cônes. La coupe en argent du British Museum (No. 89, p.28 & fig.23)
Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p.118, Tomb 66; pl. XIV, 5a)
